text.div:
Carbon Monoxide Poisoning (Disorders) (SNOMED)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    123775005 Carboxyhemoglobinemia (disorder)
    17383000 Toxic effect of carbon monoxide (disorder)
    214959008 Motor vehicle nontraffic accident involving accidental poisoning from carbon monoxide generated by motor vehicle, except off-road motor vehicle, while in motion, not on public highway (disorder)
    214960003 Nontraffic accident involving accidental poisoning from carbon monoxide generated by moving motor vehicle, except off-road motor vehicle, not on public highway, driver of motor vehicle injured (disorder)
    214961004 Nontraffic accident involving accidental poisoning from carbon monoxide generated by moving motor vehicle, except off-road motor vehicle, not on public highway, passenger of motor vehicle injured (disorder)
    214962006 Nontraffic accident involving accidental poisoning from carbon monoxide generated by moving motor vehicle, except off-road motor vehicle, not on public highway, motor cyclist injured (disorder)
    214963001 Nontraffic accident involving accidental poisoning from carbon monoxide generated by moving motor vehicle, except off-road motor vehicle, not on public highway, passenger on motor cycle injured (disorder)
    214964007 Nontraffic accident involving accidental poisoning from carbon monoxide generated by moving motor vehicle, except off-road motor vehicle, not on public highway, occupant of tram injured (disorder)
    214965008 Nontraffic accident with accidental poisoning from carbon monoxide generated by moving motor vehicle,except off-road vehicle, not on highway, rider of animal or animal-drawn vehicle occupant injured (disorder)
    214966009 Nontraffic accident involving accidental poisoning from carbon monoxide generated by moving motor vehicle, except off-road motor vehicle, not on public highway, pedal cyclist injured (disorder)
    214967000 Nontraffic accident involving accidental poisoning from carbon monoxide generated by moving motor vehicle, except off-road motor vehicle, not on public highway, pedestrian injured (disorder)
    216233003 Poisoning caused by carbon monoxide from aircraft while in transit, without accident to aircraft (disorder)
    216234009 Poisoning caused by carbon monoxide from aircraft while in transit, without accident to aircraft, occupant of spacecraft injured (disorder)
    216236006 Poisoning caused by carbon monoxide from aircraft while in transit, without accident to aircraft, occupant of military aircraft injured (disorder)
    216237002 Poisoning caused by carbon monoxide from aircraft while in transit, without accident to aircraft, member of crew of commercial aircraft in surface to surface transport injured (disorder)
    216239004 Poisoning caused by carbon monoxide from aircraft while in transit, without accident to aircraft, occupant of commercial aircraft in surface to air transport injured (disorder)
    216241003 Poisoning caused by carbon monoxide from aircraft while in transit, without accident to aircraft, occupant of unpowered aircraft, except parachutist, injured (disorder)
    216242005 Poisoning caused by carbon monoxide from aircraft while in transit, without accident to aircraft, parachutist injured (disorder)
    216243000 Poisoning caused by carbon monoxide from aircraft while in transit, without accident to aircraft, member of ground crew or airline employee injured (disorder)
    216819007 Accidental poisoning by carbon monoxide from incomplete combustion of piped gas (disorder)
    216836004 Accidental poisoning by motor vehicle exhaust gas (disorder)
    216843005 Accidental poisoning caused by carbon monoxide from incomplete combustion of coal in domestic stove or fireplace (disorder)
    216845003 Accidental poisoning caused by carbon monoxide from incomplete combustion of coke in domestic stove or fireplace (disorder)
    216846002 Accidental poisoning caused by carbon monoxide from incomplete combustion of wood in domestic stove or fireplace (disorder)
    216847006 Accidental poisoning caused by carbon monoxide from incomplete combustion of kerosene or paraffin in domestic stove or fireplace (disorder)
    216850009 Accidental poisoning caused by carbon monoxide from blast furnace gas (disorder)
    216851008 Accidental poisoning caused by carbon monoxide from kiln vapor (disorder)
    216852001 Accidental poisoning caused by carbon monoxide from incomplete combustion of fuels in industrial use (disorder)
    219131005 Self poisoning caused by motor vehicle exhaust gas (disorder)
    219324001 Injury undetermined whether accidentally or purposely inflicted, poisoning by motor vehicle exhaust gas (disorder)
    242840004 Self poisoning caused by carbon monoxide (disorder)
    420057003 Accidental poisoning caused by carbon monoxide (disorder)
    95872005 Carbon monoxide poisoning from motor vehicle exhaust (disorder)
    95873000 Carbon monoxide poisoning from faulty furnace AND/OR heater (disorder)
    95874006 Carbon monoxide poisoning from fire (disorder)
